opponent.label: Misaka Mikoto
opponent.description:
Known by many epithets: "Railgun", "The Ace of Tokiwadai", or "Biri-Biri": The 3rd ranked Level 5 Misaka Mikoto has come to the Inventory.
A two for one Tsundere and walking army,
She is friendly, a collector of Gekota merchandise and enjoys making new friends.
